original_text: Boaz said to the town's leaders and to all the people there, ‘You have all seen today that I have bought the land from Naomi. I have bought all the land that belonged to Elimelech, Kilion and Mahlon.
korean_text: 보아스가 장로들과 모든 백성에게 이르되 내가 엘리멜렉과 기룐과 말론에게 있던 모든 것을 나오미의 손에서 산 일에 너희가 오늘 증인이 되었고

sentences.original_text: Boaz said to the town's leaders
and to all the people there
that I have bought the land from Naomi
I have bought all the land
that belonged to Elimelech, Kilion and Mahlon
